website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight charger and hand warmer that can quickly recharge your favorite device.
pros: Color choices include rose gold, black, and dark black
3 temperature modes: low, medium, and high
Charger option quickly recharges phones and other devices
cons: Some claim this device isn't that durable
Reports of charging element dying while the hand warmer still works

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have Reynaud syndrome. I’ve used disposables in the past. This thing is amazing. Works perfectly and will charge my phone.
customer_reviews.author: gr8hnd

customer_reviews.title: Temperature is maintained unlike the disposable hand warmer packs
customer_reviews.text: These hand warmers have been working great. I run quite a bit and this winter has been pretty rough, especially with getting the hands cold. I turn these hand warmers on low and placing them in my mittens, my hands stay nice and warm. The warmers easily last for my longest runs, 4 hours or more. I have never have had to increase the setting above low and the movement of running doesn’t bother the warmers and they are easily turned off or back on while they are in my mittens, while on the run.
customer_reviews.author: showtime

customer_reviews.title: This gizmo is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I've ALWAYS got cold hands-unless I'm hot flashing! LoL.. Anyway this gizmo fixes that.. You can hold it in your hand, pass it back and forth, leave it in your pocket and it warms you up in a flash. I bought several as gifts as well and they're a BIG HIT. Turns out my girlfriend has Renaud's Syndrome (extremely poor circulation) and she put the one I gave her inside one mitten on the drive to work. She sent me pix afterwards and the contrast between the two hands was scary! So she bought another one, but noted that it's difficult to drive to work with both! AHAHA! Don't do it, but buy this Hand Warmer!
customer_reviews.author: CBC

customer_reviews.title: Gets so hot!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I was super sceptical and figured I would return it if it sucked. Turns out if gets hot AF! My fingers started to hurt a little and I had to turn it down! I'm literally buying another one right now. I am very impressed. Update: I took it to an outdoor concert last night where it was 25 degrees. I left the unit on high and put it in my chest pocket and it worked so amazingly well and kept me warm! The runtime on high was 4.5 hours before it died. Very happ.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Arras

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize how much I needed this until I had it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace single-use hand warmers and the click-it heat hand warmers that you need to boil to reset. I wasn't sure I would like it, but WOW. I love this thing. I charge it up and it will hold a charge for a long time. It fits well into a pocket, it has a nice smooth finish that feels good to hold, and it can also be used as a power bank to charge other things (like my phone, which doesn't hold a charge nearly as long). I love that this provides quick, consistent heat. I'm planning to buy more of these for gifts!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Heat

You also can't charge and use at the same time, which I assume is a safety feature, but keep that in mind if you're going to be away from a power source for a long period of time.

I live in Minnesota and right now the wind chills are around -10 to - 20. I would highly recommend this to anyone living in cold climates.
